name: Spook Control
description:
Spook Control by Nexdrol Games

The Haunted House in the Theme Park you work at has been cursed and some of the Props have turned into real ghosts.

Scare the Visitors towards the Exit using the remaining Props and by blocking off Paths with Stone Blocks.

Left Click: Place a Ghost Prop
Right Click: Place a Stone Block
R: Reset
Space: Show Spook Radius 
Escape: Skip Level
